ValidationRule.description: If value is over £250/€285/$320 then advisors from Derby or Bucharest must select from the who gave vocal authorisation picklist (QA and DM's only)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (OR($User.Department = "Derby",$User.Department = "Bucharest"),
AND( Write_Off_Amount__c >= 250, ISPICKVAL(Currency__c, "GBP")) || AND( Write_Off_Amount__c >= 285, ISPICKVAL(Currency__c, "EUR")) || AND( Write_Off_Amount__c >= 320, ISPICKVAL(Currency__c, "USD")),
TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Peter Broom", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Aaron Gourlay", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Karen Edwards", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Katie Constantine", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Kelly Butcher", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Laurence Brocard", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Chanel Claringbold", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Natalie Hutton", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Tracie Graham", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Disruption", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Stephanie Ribeiro", TEXT(Who_Gave_Vocal_Authorisation__c)<> "Sarah Jones" )
